Priest Egnos: May the blessings of Einhasad and Eva be with you! Well come to the Temple of Light. I am Egnos, God's servant. I think Bishop Hollint has something on his mind these days. If you need any help please don't bother him and come to me or Father Vardin. I will do my best to serve you.
